hero_title: Master Neural Networks Through Interactive Learning
hero_description: Explore the fascinating world of neural networks through our interactive courses, visualizations, and hands-on tools.
neural_network_desc: Watch how neurons connect and interact in this live visualization of a neural network.
footer_description: Neural Network Explorer provides interactive learning resources to help you master the concepts and applications of neural networks.

about.title: About Neural Network Explorer
about.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of AI innovators through interactive education
about.mission_text1: At Neural Network Explorer, we believe that understanding artificial intelligence and neural networks should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical background.
about.mission_text2: Our mission is to demystify complex concepts through interactive visualizations, hands-on learning experiences, and a supportive community environment.
about.mission_text3: Founded in Sri Lanka in 2023, we've grown to reach learners in over 40 countries, helping them build the skills needed for the AI-driven future.
about.value1_desc: We create content that breaks down complex topics into understandable pieces, making neural networks accessible to learners at all levels.
about.value2_desc: We constantly push the boundaries of educational technology, creating new ways to visualize and interact with neural networks.
about.value3_desc: We foster a supportive community where learners can collaborate, share insights, and grow together in their AI journey.
about.story_text1: Neural Network Explorer began as a passion project in a small apartment in Colombo, Sri Lanka. Our founder, Amal Perera, was frustrated by how difficult it was to visualize and truly understand neural networks during his own learning journey.
about.story_text2: What started as a simple visualization tool quickly grew as educators and students alike discovered its value. Within a year, we expanded our offerings to include comprehensive courses, tutorials, and interactive games - all designed with the same mission of making neural networks more intuitive and accessible.
about.story_text3: Today, Neural Network Explorer has evolved into a full-fledged learning platform with a dedicated team of developers, designers, and educators. We're proud of our Sri Lankan roots and the global community we've built, connecting AI enthusiasts from around the world.
about.story_text4: As we look to the future, we remain committed to our original vision: demystifying artificial intelligence and empowering the next generation of innovators with the knowledge and tools they need to succeed.
about.contact_text: Have questions or want to know more about our services? Reach out to us!
about.footer_description: Making AI education accessible and engaging for everyone.
about.copyright: © {year} Neural Network Explorer. All rights reserved.

home.title: Neural Network Explorer

home.feature1Desc: Learn neural network concepts through interactive visualizations and examples.
home.feature2Desc: Build your own neural networks with guided projects and tutorials.
home.feature3Desc: Join our community of learners and experts to share knowledge and get help.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Neural Network Explorer

what_is_nne.question: What is Neural Network Explorer?
what_is_nne.answer: Neural Network Explorer is an interactive learning platform designed to help users understand neural networks through visualizations, courses, tutorials, and hands-on tools. Our platform makes complex AI concepts accessible to learners of all levels.

who_is_for.question: Who is Neural Network Explorer for?
who_is_for.answer: Our platform is designed for students, educators, professionals, and anyone interested in learning about neural networks and AI. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to deepen your knowledge, we have resources tailored to different skill levels.

languages.question: Which languages are supported?
languages.answer: Currently, Neural Network Explorer is available in English and Sinhala. We're working on adding more languages to make our platform accessible to even more learners worldwide.

course_access.question: How do I access the courses?
course_access.answer: To access our courses, you need to create an account. Some introductory content is available for free, while our comprehensive courses require a subscription. Visit our Pricing page for more details on subscription options.

certificate.question: Do I get a certificate after completing a course?
certificate.answer: Yes! Upon successful completion of any course, you'll receive a digital certificate that you can add to your resume or share on professional platforms like LinkedIn.

cancel_subscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel_subscription.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to your Account Settings and selecting the 'Subscription' tab. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

technical_issues.question: I'm experiencing technical issues. How can I get help?
technical_issues.answer: For technical support, please visit our Contact page and submit a support ticket. Our team is available to help you resolve any issues you might encounter.

browser.question: Which browsers are supported?
browser.answer: Neural Network Explorer works best on modern browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend keeping your browser updated to the latest version for the best experience.
